paragraphs.body: Lee lives with her spouse, Kip Manley, and her daughter, Taran.
paragraphs.text: Lee lives with her spouse, Kip Manley, and her daughter, Taran.

paragraphs.body: Lee has many years' experience in not only drawing and cartooning, but graphic design and producing both 2D and 3D projects. She has created, prepared, assisted, and overseen projects from educational comics to an arts magazine to production specification guidelines.
paragraphs.text: Lee has many years' experience in not only drawing and cartooning, but graphic design and producing both 2D and 3D projects. She has created, prepared, assisted, and overseen projects from educational comics to an arts magazine to production specification guidelines.

paragraphs.body: She works for Ziba Design as a Senior Production Designer and has spent over fifteen years in the graphics and design field. She has also served as art director for an arts magazine and was a founding member of the Stumptown Comics Foundation.
paragraphs.text: She works for Ziba Design as a Senior Production Designer and has spent over fifteen years in the graphics and design field. She has also served as art director for an arts magazine and was a founding member of the Stumptown Comics Foundation.

paragraphs.body: She is also the writer and artist of Dicebox, a long-form comic that she has been posting online for about a decade.
paragraphs.text: She is also the writer and artist of Dicebox, a long-form comic that she has been posting online for about a decade.
